list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: Add packaging rules to exclude and pick first `META-INF/INDEX.LIST`
This commit introduces a `packaging` block in the `app/build.gradle.kts` file to manage resource merging.
The new configuration excludes and then picks the first occurrence of `META-INF/INDEX.LIST` to resolve potential build conflicts.

task.summary:
refactor: Remove explicit JVM toolchain from build-logic
The explicit `kotlin { jvmToolchain(23) }` block has been removed from `build-logic/settings.gradle.kts`. This change simplifies the configuration, as the JVM toolchain is managed by the parent project.

refactor: Adjust Hilt plugin and dependency configuration
Removes the explicit application of the `genesis.android.hilt` convention plugin from the `app` module.
The Hilt compiler dependency is changed from `ksp` to `implementation` to align with the new configuration.

refactor: Adjust Hilt plugin and dependency configuration
Removes the explicit application of the `genesis.android.hilt` convention plugin from the `app` module.
The Hilt compiler dependency is changed from `ksp` to `implementation` to align with the new configuration. fix: Resolve resource conflicts in packaging options
Adds a `packaging` block to the `app/build.gradle.kts` file to manage resource conflicts. This change ensures that duplicate `META-INF/INDEX.LIST` files are handled correctly by excluding them and then picking the first one encountered during the build process.

feat: Add packaging rules to exclude and pick first `META-INF/INDEX.LIST`
This commit introduces a `packaging` block in the `app/build.gradle.kts` file to manage resource merging.
The new configuration excludes and then picks the first occurrence of `META-INF/INDEX.LIST` to resolve potential build conflicts.

option.value:
feat: Add packaging rules to exclude and pick first `META-INF/INDEX.LIST`
This commit introduces a `packaging` block in the `app/build.gradle.kts` file to manage resource merging.
The new configuration excludes and then picks the first occurrence of `META-INF/INDEX.LIST` to resolve potential build conflicts.
